text:
@CathiBrennan67 1. #COVID19 is a LOT more contagious than flu.
2. We get flu shots, but no vaccine for this. 
3. Unsure all the ways it spreads.
4. Don’t know when crisis ends.
5. @POTUS isn’t leading.
6. Healthcare system unprepared.
7. Doctors and nurses are falling.
8. It’s global AND local.
